subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
Through intelligence gathering and report, it has come to the
knowledge of government that your long overdue payment despite all
efforts you have made to receive the fund has been futile and it was
discovered that some officials acting in collaboration with forces yet
to the identified have been behind this, thereby frustrating the
efforts of government to get your fund released. This is very
regrettable.
The government is not unaware of the untold hardship this has brought
to you and has therefore come up with a new strategy to ensure
unhindered process that will ensure quick release of your fund.
In line with the above, your are hereby directed to reconfirm your
full details to enable furnish you with further details on the
process.
Regards,
Johnson Mark
From Union bank
of Switzerland
WhatsApp 41-78-460-6337

subject: Re:   Dear Sir
body:
Hello Johnson Mark,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern and the efforts of the government in resolving this issue. It's indeed been a challenging time trying to receive my overdue payment.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide more details about this new strategy that the government has come up with? I'm interested in understanding how it will ensure a quick release of my fund.

Also, could you clarify what specific details you need from me? I want to make sure I provide all necessary information without compromising my personal security.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gladys
